parameters.name: AggregationInterval
parameters.description: The sampling interval of the flow log. Unit: seconds. Valid values: **1**, **5**, and **10** (default).

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description:
The description of the flow log.

The description must be 1 to 256 characters in length and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: FlowLogName
parameters.description:
The name of the flow log.

The name must be 1 to 128 characters in length and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: LogStoreName
parameters.description:
The name of the Logstore that stores the captured traffic data.

*   The name can contain only lowercase letters, digits, hyphens (-), and underscores (\_).
*   The name must start and end with a lowercase letter or a digit.
*   The name must be 3 to 63 characters in length.

parameters.name: ProjectName
parameters.description:
The name of the project that stores the captured traffic data.

*   The name can contain only lowercase letters, digits, and hyphens (-).
*   The name must start and end with a lowercase letter or a digit.
*   The name must be 3 to 63 characters in length.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where you want to create the flow log. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource whose traffic you want to capture.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource whose traffic you want to capture. Valid values:

*   **NetworkInterface**: elastic network interface (ENI)
*   **VSwitch**: all ENIs in a vSwitch
*   **VPC**: all ENIs in a virtual private cloud (VPC)

parameters.name: TrafficType
parameters.description:
The type of traffic that you want to capture. Valid values:

*   **All**: all traffic
*   **Allow**: traffic that is allowed
*   **Drop**: traffic that is rejected
